text:
Hi all!

There is a small problem with validation of the Email address. It says that Email is not valid, although it is valid.

Example:
```artem+458436@dikmarov.partner```
Error:
```{
  "status": "error",
  "message": "Property values were not valid: [{\"isValid\":false,\"message\":\"Email address artem+458436@dikmarov.partner is invalid\",\"error\":\"INVALID_EMAIL\",\"name\":\"email\"}]",
  "correlationId": hidden,
  "category": "VALIDATION_ERROR"
}```
Who can tell me where I can report the problem?

Hi all,
I want to get the contact list data in the modules.
Please help me to get

Hi <@U02AJR8PLKY>,

Probably it's checking for mail domains such as `.com` or `.partners` instead of `.partner`And due to the unavailability of any domain in the mail...it's saying the mail is invalid.

<https://legacydocs.HubSpot.com/docs/faq/how-does-HubSpot-validate-email-addresses>

Hey <@U02AJR8PLKY>,

Probably the mai Id end with `partners` instead of `partner`

Incorrect Mail: artem+458436@dikmarov.partner

Correct Mail: artem+458436@dikmarov.partners

Check the list here: <https://data.iana.org/TLD/tlds-alpha-by-domain.txt>

Anybody notice diff json response of api call between test and prod environment

 we are getting diff api response /marketing-emails/v1/emails between our test and prod environment
Is it possible to add the HubSpot Team as a property on a custom object?

Starting to ingest marketing events API data and trying to make sense of the *appName* property. I am so far seeing the following but am not sure what means what... Anyone can help?
• AbBatch
• Batch
• BatchTest
• Litmus
• ResubscriptionEmails
• SingleSendEmailApi

I created an app that contains a webhook with the scopes being "contact" that is subscribed to  Deal, on-create. My "Target URL" server is running on AWS (not local). That URL does receive the "Test this subscription" JSON package. So my server endpoint seems fine.
My question regarding OAuth and webhooks: How can a webhook utilize the refresh token process of the OAuth flow? There is no "user" to submit it. It's pub/sub process.

to quote this documentation:
“just to add some color here, if you’re just using webhooks you only need to install the app to your account. An app is only installed once you _initially_ <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/methods/oauth2/get-access-and-refresh-tokens|exchange the code from your redirect URI> to generate access and refresh tokens. Tokens in this case will not matter unless you were making requests to the HubSpot APIs with those tokens you got back. Since it doesn’t sound like you are, simply generating the access and refresh tokens will suffice to install your app and start using Webhooks indefinitely.”
<https://community.HubSpot.com/t5/APIs-Integrations/How-to-generate-the-refresh-token-for-a-Webhook-App/td-p/273820>

Hi All,
I am getting such kind of error, Please can anybody help me please.
Access to XMLHttpRequest at '<https://api.hubapi.com/contacts/v1/lists/all/contacts/all?hapikey=demo>' from origin '<https://brandsafetysummit.com>' has been blocked by CORS policy: Response to preflight request doesn't pass access control check: No 'Access-Control-Allow-Origin' header is present on the requested resource.
